title: LULU SKIN CONCEPT!! (Little Petal Lulu)
body:
So I absolutely fell in love with the Mystic skin for Elementalist Lux and It brought up an idea.. I ended up coming up with this..

Little Petal Lulu!
(Sorry this is so roughly drawn up.. I'll do a nice draw up later)

BUT THIS WOULD BE SO CUTE AS A SKIN RITO PLS

http://i.imgur.com/IvQ5EDm.png

replies.body: wow you are good at drawing. how long did that take you?
It was very quick since it was just a sketch up! about 15 minutes~
How the fuck, i really don't understand how that only took 15 minutes.

haha I know right? Whenever I try to draw something it takes me forever and most of the time it ends up looking like trash.

I can't understand how people do such nice artwork so quickly.
I think its just practice.. this was a very quick draw up of an idea. Very far from completion XD
